description: Deed of variation to Section 106 DC/15/092295 (as amended) to address the following:1) Amend Clause 1.1 of the s106 agreement dated 23 March 2016;2) Schedule 1, para 1.2 - add new Social Rent definition;3) Delete LBL Income Threshold Clause 1.1;4) Delete 'Affordable Rent' definition and replace with 'Social Rent';5) Delete 'Affordable Rented Unit' definition;6) Amend Clause 5.5.3 and 5.8 of the DoV dated 7 October 2021 - (Plots 1, 3 and 6)7) Amend Clause 5.8 of the DoV dated 7 October 2021 - (Plots 1, 3 and 6);8) Delete thresholds in Clauses 16.2 and 16.3 of the s106 agreement dated 23 March 2016;9) Clause 1.3A of Schedule 1 of the Original Agreement as amended by DoV dated 21/2/23 (Commercial Units Fit-Out Date);10) Amend Para 1.1 of Schedule 2 of the s106 agreement dated 23 March 2016 re no. of Affordable Units to be provided;11) Amend table in paragraph 1.2 of Schedule 2 of the s106, as varied by the Sixth Deed of Variation dated 2 November 2023;12) Amend Paras. 1.13 and 1.14, and delete 1.15 and 1.25 of Schedule 2 of the s106 dated 23 March 2016;13) Wheelchair Unitsat land bounded by Oxestalls Road, Grove Street, Dragoon Road and Evelyn Street SE8.'The comprehensive redevelopment of land bounded by Oxestalls Road, Grove Street, Dragoon Road and Evelyn Street SE8, but excluding Scott House, 185 Grove Street (formerly known as Diploma Works) seeking outline planning permission (Phases 1-3)  for the demolition of existing buildings on the site, excluding former Public House on Grove Street to facilitate the phased redevelopment of the site to provide up to 10,413 square meters (GEA) non-residential floorspace comprising (A1) Shops, (A2) Financial & Professional Services, (A3) Restaurants & Cafâ€šs, (A4) Drinking Establishments, (A5) Hot Food Takeaways, (B1) Business, (D1) Non-Residential Institutions and (D2) Assembly & Leisure uses and an energy centre and up to 1132 residential units in buildings ranging from 3 to 24 storeys in height, together with car and cycle parking, associated highway infrastructure, public realm works and provision of open space and detailed planning permission (Phase 1) for up to 562 residential units and up to  in buildings ranging from 3 to 24 storeys in height, together with car and cycle parking, associated highway infrastructure, energy centre, public realm works and provision of open space.'
site_name: CROWN AND NEW BALTIC, PARK AND BRIDGE AND VICTORIA WHARVES, BOUNDED BY GROVE STREET,  DRAGOON STREET AND EVELYN STREET, OXESTALLS ROAD, LONDON, SE8
